1371: Erkenradis was born in St. Joris straet in 1371.
1389: Erkenradis moved to Die Coninc straet.A.3 after marriage.
Lost sibling Nimme in 1389 when Nimme was 14.
Got married to Richolfus at age 19 in 1389.
1372: Lost sibling Thezonus in 1372 when Thezonus was 3.
1376: Lost mother at the age of 5 in childbirth.
1391: Gave birth to Heylewigis in 1391 at age 20.
1392: Gave birth to Poppo in 1392 at age 21.
1396: Lost daughter Heylewigis when Heylewigis was 6 years old.
1397: Lost son Poppo when Poppo was 6 years old.
